Class PhysicalMeasureInstrument<Q extends Quantity<Q>>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.ui.devices.PhysicalMeasureInstrument<Q>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PressureGaugeViewer, ThermometerViewer
public abstract class PhysicalMeasureInstrument<Q extends Quantity<Q>> extends Object
Base class for physical measurement instruments. Provides a common interface for all instrument visualizations.

Instruments display real-time physical quantities with appropriate units and visual representations.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
